      • Method Detail

        • static ResolvedURI create(java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object> opts, VFS vfs, java.lang.Object uri)

          Takes a URI and resolves it in the context of a VFS. All supplied options will applied as far as possible. Non-VFS options will be added as praxis options.

          Returns:
          A resolved URI with praxis options
          Parameters:
          opts - Vfs and praxis options
          vfs - The VFS to stage against.
          uri - The URI to stage

        • @java.lang.Override java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object> getPraxis()

          Any VFS action options (praxis) that are associated with this URI

          Returns:
          List of potential options

        • @java.lang.Override java.lang.Object getUri()

          URI that has been resolved

        • @java.lang.Override boolean isLocal()

          Whether this URI is local

          Returns:
          True if local

        • @java.lang.Override boolean isResolved()

          Returns true is this URI has been resolved

          Returns:
          True if located on the virtual file system

        • @java.lang.Override VfsURI resolve()

          NOP - This URI is already resolved.

          Returns:
          The resolved URI
